name: Sunset evaluations modified, see , 5. Dental service corporations, see chapter 423. Health care peer review, see chapter 671D. Health care professionals, see chapter 451D.
text: §448-4  Fraudulent advertising.  It shall be unlawful for any person to publish or circulate, directly or indirectly, any statements relating to the person's practice of dentistry that are or tend to be false, fraudulent, or misleading. [L 1917, c 136, §4; RL 1925, §1068; RL 1935, §983; am L 1937, c 220, §2; RL 1945, §2154; am L 1947, c 170, §1; am L 1949, c 177, §1; RL 1955, §61-4; HRS §448-4; am L 1983, c 220, §2]
